title: Which song touched your heart the most? What does that song remind you of? - Quora

response.answer_text: The song that still, after all these years, touch my heart is this one;  We Are the World - USA for Africa (1985) I get touched by the fact that all those famous artists came together to help out starving people, especially in Ethiopia, where there had been a long lasting famine.My heart vibrates with the simple, but still powerful, message in the lyrics. *)As a bonus, the joy of listening to all those wonderful voices, singing together. I often close my eyes, to really enjoy. My favorite part is when Bruce Springsteens powerful voice comes on. *goosebumps**) There comes a timeWhen we heed a certain callWhen the world must come together as oneThere are people dyingOh, and it's time to lend a hand to lifeThe greatest gift of all  The promotion and merchandise aided the success of "We Are the World" and raised over $63 million (equivalent to $144 million today) for humanitarian aid in Africa and the US. __________ Before the writing of "We Are the World", American entertainer and social activist Harry Belafonte had thought for some time to have a song recorded by the most famous artists in the music industry at the time. He planned to have the proceeds donated to a new organization called United Support of Artists for Africa (USA for Africa). The non-profit foundation would then feed and relieve starving people in Africa, specifically Ethiopia, where around one million people died during the country's 1983–1985 famine Read the full article in this link - We Are the World - Wikipedia

These songs reminds me someone whom i loved more than myself, makes me cry, reminds me beautiful moments we had, these are the ones touched my heart the most. Martin Garrix - So Far Away  Borgeous & Shaun Frank - This Could Be Love  Audien - Something Better  Avicii - Waiting for love  KSHMR - Jammu This one is about different love, mother’s love, amazingly shown in video and music is excellent.  I think i have lots of others as well but these are the ones i would pick for your answer :)
